name: Cheater (Desert Fox Team)
description:
One Player Game.

A card game, where a player draws a card, and the second player has three choices: to draw another card with the same number the first player claims, or to "lie" and claim to draw a card with the same number even if it's not, or to accuse the first player of lying, or to just pass this turn to a third player.

The first player to finish his cards wins.
